duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop mathematical models underpinning the platform’s core services.
Conduct exploratory data analysis and fit statistical, machine learning, or optimization models.
Collaborate with Software Engineers to implement algorithms and models in production.
Design and implement both simulated and live experiments.
Analyze experimental and observational data; communicate findings; facilitate launch decisions.
Drive collaboration and coordination with cross-functional teams.

education_certification.credential: M.S. or Ph.D. in Machine Learning, Operations Research, Optimization, Computer Science, or other quantitative fields or related work experience
